messages.content: It's who is best to govern Scotland, resist Tory austerity and use new powers to make a meaningful difference. Under the leadership of Nicola Sturgeon, the SNP's record in government is strong and we are ready to govern again.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Strongly stand up for social justice and against the Tory austerity agenda
Support community policing and work with local officers and the community to keep Edinburgh Northern and Leith safer
Help to deliver more affordable, energy-efficient, good quality housing in our area
Support community empowerment and appropriate regeneration - and represent concerns about any inappropriate development proposals
Support local schools, youth groups and community initiatives
Stand up for Scotland's NHS and work to help make it even better for patients and staff
Champion and support local small businesses and the creative industries in Edinburgh Northern and Leith
Work hard to create a greener Scotland and realise even more of our renewable energy potential

issues.education: Support local schools, youth groups and community initiatives
issues.environment: Work hard to create a greener Scotland and realise even more of our renewable energy potential
issues.governance: Under the leadership of Nicola Sturgeon, the SNP's record in government is strong and we are ready to govern again.
issues.health: Stand up for Scotland's NHS and work to help make it even better for patients and staff
issues.socialWelfare: Strongly stand up for social justice and against the Tory austerity agenda

housing.content: Help to deliver more affordable, energy-efficient, good quality housing in our area

leaflet.personalStatement: I believe I have the ability and experience to be a strong, new voice for all of us who live here in Edinburgh Northern and Leith.

images.caption: Ben Macpherson standing in front of a residential area.
